lead_paragraph: They met in high school during driver’s education classes, but it took them 14 years to accept their mutual attraction.

byline.contributor: Beth Jones contributed reporting from Boston.

headline.print_headline: A Driver’s License Leads to a Marriage License
headline.main: Seeking a Driver’s License Led to a Marriage License
